page.title: 19The Veterinary Surgeon - 2
page.content: Q. What do you think of fox and pheasant shoots? A.{I'm not a shooting man myself but I { do have to shoot animals as part { of my job when they are in pain.} Q. When you were at school was it your ambition to be a vet? A.{Yes, I used to give lectures, breed { caterpillars and other small crea- { tures and run little sales.} Q. What is the worst condition in which you have found an animal? A.{I found a mare on the forest, she { was foaling and just about alive { but her foal was dead and foxes had { eaten the foal's head and some of { the mother. She was too weak to { kick the foxes away.} Q. What do you do in your spare time? A.{I receive so many phone calls that { I don't get a lot of spare time but { I enjoy being with my own horses.}
